name: src/app/home.js
content:
import React from 'react' import {Container, Row, Col} from 'reactstrap' import ServersStatus from '../components/servers-status/servers-status' import HTMLIFrame from '../components/html-iframe/html-iframe' import ModuleSign from '../components/module/signature/module-sign' import ModuleVerify from '../components/module/signature/module-verify' import ModuleSkipChain from '../components/module/skipchain/module-skipchain' import ModuleHTML from '../components/module/html/module-html' import ModuleRandom from '../components/module/random/module-random' import './home.css'; /** * @author Gaylor Bosson (gaylor.bosson@epfl.ch) * * Index of the website where we display everything in a single page */ class Home extends React.Component { /** * @override * @returns {XML} */ render() { return (
); } } export default Home;

unknown.tagValue:
Gaylor Bosson (gaylor.bosson@epfl.ch)

Index of the website where we display everything in a single page

name: src/app.js
content:
import React from 'react' import { BrowserRouter, Route } from 'react-router-dom' import Home from './app/home' import ModuleRandom from './components/module/random/module-random' /** * Entry point of the application * External routes are used to integrate modules in an IFrame for distant website * * @author Gaylor Bosson (gaylor.bosson@epfl.ch) * @constructor */ const App = () => (
); export default App

name: App
description:
Entry point of the application
External routes are used to integrate modules in an IFrame for distant website

name: src/components/html-iframe/html-iframe.js
HTMLIFrame
description: Show a fixed IFrame when the user click on an HTML skipchain

name: onOpenHTML
description: update the html state to show the content in the IFrame

name: onCloseHTML
description: Reset the content of the html state to hide the IFrame

name: handleBack
description:
Handle the back action that will close the IFrame
We use the service instead of the state to trigger the event to possible other components

name: src/components/loading/loading-spinner.js
LoadingSpinner
description: Helper component to display a loading animation

name: src/components/module/html/module-html.js
ModuleHTML
description:
This module diplays the list of HTML skipchain. It shows only the ones with a base URL meaning that https://dedis.ch
will be shown but not https://dedis.ch/blabla

params.name: genesisList
params.description: List of the genesis blocks available

name: handleOpenPage
description: Open the HTML page with the given genesis ID

name: src/components/module/module.js
Module
description:
Base component of a module. You can define the title of the module and its icon using the name
of an icon in http://fontawesome.io/icons/

name: src/components/module/random/module-random.js
ModuleRandom
description:
This module will ask for a random number every fixed interval and display the result

The count down is shown with a kind of loading bar

name: _triggerRandomUpdate
description: Send a random request to the server and update the state with the result number

name: _checkCountDown
description:
This function will recursively call itself until the counter is reached to update the loading
animation. When the counter reached 1, it will trigger an update

name: src/components/module/signature/module-sign.js
ModuleSign
description: Module to upload a file and sign it using the current skipchain

name: handleFileDropped
description: Change the file we want to sign

name: handleBack
description: Cancel the current file

name: src/components/module/signature/module-verify.js
ModuleVerify
description: Module to verify a given signature file and the target file

name: handleFileDrop
description: Handle a file dropped in the drop area

name: handleFileReset
description: Reset the current state to be able to change the file selected

name: _generateFeedback
description: Return the current status of the verifying process

name: _verifySignature
description: Check the signature

name: src/components/module/signature/utils/drop-file-area.js
DropFileArea
description: This component is used to drop a file or upload a file from the user's computer

name: handleClick
description: Bubble the click of the user to the hidden input

name: handleUpload
description: Trigger the file upload event

name: handleDrop
description: Trigger the file upload event

name: _handleFileDropped
description: Trigger the file dropped event with the given file

name: src/components/module/signature/utils/sign-area.js
SignArea
description: Show the status of the sign process

name: handleBackAction
description: Return to the drop file component

name: handleSign
description: Send a sign request over WS with the current loaded file

name: _triggerOnBack
description: Trigger the back event

name: src/components/module/skipchain/module-skipchain.js
ModuleSkipChain
description:
This module displays the list of the available skipchains except the ones
that contains an URL in the data

name: onGenesisUpdate
description: It will update the state with the current skipchain

name: onGenesisError
description: Update the state to display the error

name: handleGenesisChange
description: It will trigger the skipchain change to the genesis service

name: _renderError
description: Return the XML to display an error when it occurs

name: src/components/servers-status/last-update.js
LastUpdate
description: Increase a count over time and display the time since the given timestamp

name: src/components/servers-status/servers-status.js
ServersStatus
description: Table component which displays the list of servers and their status

params.name: status
params.description: {Object} object with the server addresses as keys

name: generateLoading
description: Return the loading component

name: generateRows
description: Generate a table row from a list of status responses

name: parseTraffic
description: Compute the total traffic since the server started

name: parseUptime
description: Convert ??h??m??s to the total amount of seconds

name: formatUptime
description: Format the uptime in a nicer string

name: src/index.js
src/lib/cothority-messages.js
encodeMessage
description: Encode a model to be transmitted over websocket

name: decodeMessage
description: Decode a message coming from a websocket

name: getModel
description: Return the protobuf loaded model

name: createSignatureRequest
description: Create an encoded message to make a sign request to a cothority node

params.name: message
params.description: to sign stored in a Uint8Array

name: decodeSignatureResponse
description: Return the decoded response

name: decodeStatusResponse
description: Return the decoded response

name: src/models/signature-file.js
SignatureFile
description: This model defines the structure of the signature file the user can download after a signature request

name: getHash
description: Return the hash in hex or buffer form

name: save
description: Create the JSON and download the file to the user's computer

name: parse
description: Parse a given string from a signature file and populate the fields

name: src/services/genesis.js
GenesisService
description:
This service will contact the DEDIS server to get the list of skipchains with their servers. Those servers may
not be available.

name: constructor
description: Make a request to the GENESIS_BLOCK_SERVER url to get the list of genesis IDs of the skipchains

name: subscribe
description: Add the given listener to the list of object which will be called on update events

params.name: listener
params.description: must have onGenesisUpdate function to get the updates

name: unsubscribe
description: Remove the given listener from the list

name: updateGenesis
description: Trigger either an update or an error update

name: setCurrentGenesisID
description: Change the current skipchain given the ID of the genesis block

name: getLatestFromGenesisID
description:
Given a genesis ID and a block ID, it will get the servers of the skipchain and then fetch the list of
blocks of the skipchain to finally return the block if it exists
If the block ID is not provided, we return the latest block

name: _triggerEvent
description:
Trigger an update event to the listener with params:
 1. blocks The list of blocks of the skipchain
 2. genesisList The current list of available skipchains
 3. curr_genesis The current genesis ID of the current skipchain

params.name: listener
params.description: An object with a declaration of onGenesisUpdate

name: _triggerError
description: Trigger an error event

name: _fetchStatusForGenesisID
description:
It will check that the skipchain exists and then it gets the list of blocks. Finally
it trigger according to the result either an update or an error

name: src/services/iframe.js
IFrameService
description:
This service takes care to trigger open and back events to components when the user
click on an HTML skipchain

name: constructor
description:
1. Get the html node for the service
2. Add a listener to message event

name: subscribe
description: Subscribe the listener to the upcoming events

name: unsubscribe
description: Remove the listener from the list of subscribed objects

name: open
description: Fetch and display the page of the skipchain with the given genesis ID

params.name: id
params.description: 64 hex-digits ID of the genesis block

name: back
description: Hide the website emulator

name: _triggerOpenEvent
description: Call the open callback of each listener

name: _triggerBackEvent
description: Call the back callback of each listener

name: hexToUTF8
description: Translate char by char a sequence of hex digit to UTF-8 digit

name: src/services/skipchain.js
SkipChainService
description:
This service provide the function to get the list of blocks of the skipchain with the
underlying logic and verification

name: getLatestBlock
description:
Given a list of servers and a genesis block id, try to get the latest block and return a promise that will resolve
with the list of server's addresses (WebSocket address)

name: _getUpdates
description:
Try to get the update list of skipblocks from an address and a genesis block id
Parse the response to resolve the promise with the list of WebSocket addresses of the servers

params.name: genesisID
params.description: Hex representation of the genesis block id

name: _verifyUpdates
description: Check the sanity of the skip blocks and return false if an error occurred

name: src/services/status.js
StatusService
description: This service takes care of keeping the status of the roster of the current skipchain up-to-date

name: constructor
description: Subscribe the the genesis service

name: onGenesisUpdate
description: On a new skipchain it resets the status and fetch the new roster

name: triggerUpdate
description: Send the new status to listeners

name: subscribe
description: Add the given object to the list of listeners

name: unsubscribe
description: Remove the listener from the list

name: getAvailableRoster
description:
Return the list of server that are responding
Check the protobuf definition of a Status message for the return array

name: _updateStatus
description: Maintain a timeout to fetch every given interval the status of the servers

name: _triggerEvent
description: Send the status to the given listener

name: src/services/websocket.js
CothorityWebsocket
description: This service maintains or create websockets for the different actions the front-end can perform

name: getStatus
description: Get the status of the given server among a WS

name: getSignature
description: Get the signature of the given hash with the given roster

name: getLatestBlock
description: Get the list of blocks of the skipchain with the given genesis ID

name: storeNewBlock
description: Store a new block with the given roster

name: getRandom
description: Get a random number from address

name: createSocket
description: Use the existing socket or create a new one if required

params.name: error
params.description: Function callback if an error occurred

params.name: callback
params.description: Function callback when a message is received

name: src/utils/buffer.js
hex2buf
description: Given a hexadecimal string it converts it to a Uint8Array buffer

name: buf2hex
description: Given a buffer, convert it to an hexadecimal string

name: src/utils/file.js
hashFile
description: Read the given file object and return a promise that will resolve with the hash of the file

name: readAsString
description: Read a file as a string

name: src/utils/network.js
tcp2ws
description: Transform a tcp address to the corresponding WS address because the Cothority uses the port + 1 of the tcp address

unknown.tagValue: {String} The same address with the port value +1

return.description: The same address with the port value +1
